title: Offer Review | Microsoft | L60 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: BTech from IIT, non Computer Science 
Years of Experience: 3 years
Prior Experience: MNC Bank, Pune
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: Software Dev L60
Location: Hyderabad, India
Salary: INR 2300,000 (This includes 12% company contribution to pf)
Relocation: INR 0
Signing Bonus: INR 300,000 (200,000 on joining remaining 100,000 after completing 1 year)
Stock bonus: $40K stock grant vested over 4 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 20% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 3300,000 (assuming bonus = 10% salary)
Benefits: Standard microsoft benefits
Other details: Do not have a competing offer.
Current Compensation - ~INR 1750,000 (all base) + Annual Bonus
Team - Dataverse

SInce Microsoft's salary also has included the company's contribution to pf which is 12% of basic salary, the offered salary comes out to be around INR 2150,000 to compare with current compensation.
Also relocation without relocation support is an issue.

Appraisal is progress, atleast 10% hike (expecting around 20% hike) with a annual bonus (INR 200,000 - 200,000) in March 2025.

Apart from the stocks offered, every part of the compensation will be similar to current compensation post hike.
We have just discussed the offer and not yet negotiated/got the offer but the recruiter is showing signs of Take it Or Leave it.

How about the dataverse team -  work culture, work life balance, growth etc?

Is it worth switching? I am having a strong urge to reject the current offer, what are the chances of hr coming with a new offer?
